dinner.name: Grilled Steak Tortilla Salad
dinner.description: Satisfy your taco cravings with this salad recipe, then add tortilla slices to the plate when you're done mixing it all together!

dinner.name: Hawaiian Tuna Bowl
dinner.description: This poke bowl only takes 15 minutes to whip up — much faster than it takes to hop on a plane to a tropical island!

dinner.name: Roasted Tomato and Chive Pizza
dinner.description: Pizza night doesn't have to be all sweatpants and regret. Think outside the plain cardboard box and load up the pie with good-for-you veggies.

dinner.name: Pea Pesto Pappardelle
dinner.description: Pea Pesto Pappardelle — try saying that five times fast! Oh, and this pasta dish only requires five ingredients.

dinner.name: Rustic Smoky Glazed Chicken and Veggie Bake
dinner.description: Spice-rubbed chicken with veggies and potatoes baked 'til golden brown — it sounds like a feast ready to be devoured.

dinner.name: Citrusy Shrimp-Stuffed Avocados
dinner.description: All the avocado. None of the carbs. You're welcome.

dinner.name: Chicken Souvlaki Skewers
dinner.description: We're making #MediterraneanMonday a thing with these grilled chicken kebabs and garlicky tomatoes.

dinner.name: Rotisserie Chicken Cobb Salad
dinner.description: Top a classic salad with an already-cooked rotisserie chicken for a major time-save.

dinner.name: Grilled Asparagus and Shiitake Tacos
dinner.description: Let's take Taco Tuesday to the next level, shall we? These beauties are filled to the brim with asparagus, shiitakes and all of the guac.

dinner.name: Roasted Shrimp and Poblano Salad
dinner.description: Loaded with fiery shrimp and poblano peppers, this spicy salad is sure to be a hit.

dinner.name: Crispy Tofu Bowl
dinner.description: Whether you're a vegan or not, this bowl, loaded with super-carb quinoa, roasted cashews and crispy tofu, is sure to please.

dinner.name: Roasted Vegetable and Pasta Bake
dinner.description: A hearty vegetarian dish packed with flavour, this selection of vegetables’butternut squash, asparagus and leeks’is roasted in garlicky olive oil, then tossed with chunky pasta shapes and a cheese sauce.

dinner.name: Wild-Salmon Cakes with Quinoa Salad
dinner.description: These salmon cakes are a must-have. And over a bed of fresh greens and quinoa, they make for a show-stopping meal.

dinner.name: Veggie Lo Mein
dinner.description: Call in an order to your local Thai place, then get started on our homemade vegan recipe. We bet ours will be ready way before the delivery guy shows up.

dinner.name: Crunchy Chickpea Kale Caesar
dinner.description: Crispy, crunchy and oh-so-satisfying, this kale caesar salad is a healthy, hearty dinner for any night of the week.

dinner.name: Grilled Pork Tenderloin with Grainy Mustard Vinaigrette
dinner.description: Whole, unprocessed ingredients like kale and plum tomatoes, makes this lean tenderloin a 100% heart-healthy dish.

dinner.name: Grilled Chicken with Herbed Corn Salsa
dinner.description: In just 20 minutes' time, this main course filled with fresh ingredients will be all yours.

dinner.name: Salmon Burgers with Cabbage-Apple Slaw
dinner.description: With curry powder and an apple, cabbage and cider vinegar slaw, these salmon burgers might just outrank your go-to beef recipe.

dinner.name: Peanutty Edamame and Noodle Salad
dinner.description: Stock up on Shirataki noodles stat. The gluten-free, yam-based gems make it possible to have a seriously flavorful, low-calorie dinner ready in 5 minutes.
